archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: DEAD: Verizon MSEG-4
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Managed Secure Enterprise Gateway.
Verizon’s product for their managed firewall services. This is an integrated, dedicated, and fully managed solution that helps secure private network through a suite of modular services.
The Verizon MSEG-4 and MSEG-5 have been replaced by the CNSP service at the Equinix LD5 and LD8 data centres delivered under the Core Network 2.0. The core of this service is hosted on Palo-Alto’s next generation firewall appliances
